description: PDF (Portable Document Format), developed by Adobe Systems Incorporated.  PDF represents formatted, page-oriented documents.  These documents may be structured or simple.  They may contain text, images, graphics, and other multimedia content, such as video and audio.  There is support for annotations, metadata, hypertext links, and bookmarks.

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: PDF (Portable Document Format) Family
